description.full: A brand new way to play the iconic game of Twister® is now available for Kinect on Xbox 360!  Introducing… Twister™ Mania!    The demo version includes 4 challenges of the campaign-style Play It All mode for both Single and Co-op competition types, including Shape Frenzy, Break It Down Classic and Twist & Fit Slalom.  The full version of Twister™ Mania takes the game to the next level allowing up to 8 players to compete in 3 modes with 16 ways to play and featuring thousands of shapes all set in a TWISTER- inspired environment filled with its iconic, colorful flair.   So check out the demo and you’ll be ready to grab your friends and twist into wild and crazy fun with Twister™ Mania!
description.short: A brand new way to play the iconic game of Twister® is now available for Kinect on Xbox 360!  Introducing… Twister™ Mania!    The demo version includes 4 challenges of the campaign-style Play It All mode for both Single and Co-op competition types, including Shape Frenzy, Break It Down Classic and Twist & Fit Slalom.  But there’s so much more in the full Twister™ Mania so go get it today!
